episodes.title: Ep 9: Burdened With Glorious Purpose With Stephanie Hardman
episodes.description:
This week on HTD we talk to our childhood friend Stephanie Hardman about what it was like growing up in different Living Word Churches and how it impacted us in all kinds of crazy ways! 

Join us as we discuss:
• Dads!
• Being burdened with the purpose of The Living Word agenda 
• Keeping the faith
• God Lizards that totally did appear

As always, thank you and we treasure your attention!

CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS: Religious, $*xual, and Spiritual Ab*se, High Control Environments/Relationships, Grooming by Authority Figures, Suicidal Ideations,🚨DADDY ISSUES🚨, 😱SNIPPET OF WORSHIP SONG😱

episodes.title: Ep 9: Extremely Cult Adjacent
episodes.description: You’re in for a real treat today, folks! Our guest is an intelligent, hilarious, kind-hearted human, an actual internet sensation, and also one of our dearest long-lost friends. It’s Beau Brown!! We are so thankful for the privilege of reconnecting to reminisce about the horrors together, such as: * The Centers of Learning Experience™️ * THE RIVERTON CEMETERY * Cheating on a test and still failing * Saturday School * Getting in trouble for advocating for labor rights in high school * Witnessing a car hit the school (which time, tho?) CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS: Religious and Spiritual Ab*se, High Control Environments/Relationships, Forced Manual Labor, $*xually Inappropriate Behavior, Grooming by Authority Figures, Christian Private School, Public Shaming, Stonewalling, Speaking In Tongues,🚨THE RIVERTON CEMETERY🚨

episodes.title: Ep 7: The Shiloh Show (Part 2)
episodes.description:
THE SUMMER CHAOS CONTINUES! After having a full blown technical melt down for a few weeks in a row, we are proud to bring you a re-RE-recorded Part Deux of our Shiloh summer camp romp. We pick up where we left you last: disoriented, mid-way through camp, and gearing up for another big event. Buckle up as we immerse you in memories of: 

* The Canadian National Anthem
* The classic “Iced-coffee-no-breakfast” mistake and its inevitable consequences
* 🔥FIRE🔥HAZARDS🔥 
* Sh-sh-shakin’ for the Lord
* Amphitheater debauchery 

CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Religious and Spiritual Ab*se, High Control Environments/Relationships, Forced Manual Labor, $*xually Inappropriate Behavior, Gr👀ming by Authority Figures, Using Grief to Manipulate People, POOP, Amphitheaters, Wandering Eyes,🚨BRINGING FORTH THE KINGDOM🚨 “It’s Happening Now” 👏👏

episodes.title: Ep 6: The Shiloh Show (Part 1)
episodes.description:
BRACE YOURSELVES, DISAPPOINTMENTS! This week we take you on PART 1 of a journey we’ve embarked on TOO many times… from wherever you are in the world, to a place we ne’r need return: SHILOH SUMMER CAMP! *womp WOMP!* As is tradition, our Shiloh Summer Camp plans got derailed and delayed, just like our flights to Cedar Rapids. You’ll have to bear with us through some technical difficulties, and let us trigger your memories and/or paint you a picture of: 

* THE SHILOH COMPOUND!!
* Corn!
* Grueling & constant manual labor!
* Getting in trouble for things you DIDN’T EVEN DO!
* A great big show 
* MORE CORN!

If you ever experienced Shiloh, you’re used to waiting unbearable amounts of time between things you care about, and on that note, come back in two weeks for Part 2. 

CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Religious and Spiritual Ab*se, High Control Environments/Relationships, Forced Manual Labor, $*xually Inappropriate Behavior, Grooming by Authority Figures, Amphitheaters, Cornhole,🚨THE HIGHEST SHELF🚨

episodes.title: Ep 5: Confessions of a Former Cult Princess
episodes.description:
Hello, disappointments! This week we take a deep dive with the resting bitch queen herself, the eldritch terror: Anastasia! From what dimension did she emerge? Where was she in 2018? What about the rest of her life? Join us as we discuss:
Cult Royalty: The Carol of it AllShiloh Psalm TraumaDating?? In This Economy?Other trauma!
CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Religious and Spiritual Ab*se, High Control Environments/Relationships, Narcissistic Ab*se and Manipulation, $*xually Inappropriate Behavior and Grooming by Authority Figures, Being Called Dramatic, PSALMS

episodes.title: Ep 4: The Roast of Uncle Icky 360
episodes.description:
Ok, Disappointments, hold on to your butts. It’s the Roast of Uncle Icky 360. This week we’re diving into Leandra’s “360 Review” of Uncle Icky as a boss and pastor from back in October of 2018. From inscrutable expectations to labor exploitation, this review gives a peek into Leandra’s experience as an indentured—*COUGH cough* sorry, as an EMPLOYEE of the Living Word cult. FOR COMEDY PURPOSES! And also for healing purposes lol. Join us as we un-gaslight ourselves and unpack past-Leandra’s perspective on:

Uncle Icky’s Management Style (f****n’ L O L)The cost of dissent within the cultConversational manipulation tacticsCLASSIC cult information control structureHow Uncle Icky treated women (and how uncomfortable that was)
CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Religious and Spiritual Ab*se, Labor Exploitation, Physical and Emotional Ab*se, High Control Environments/Relationships, Narcissistic Ab*se and Manipulation, $*xually Inappropriate Behavior and Grooming by Authority Figures, Childhood $*xual Ab*se, THE LITERAL ACTUAL STRUCTURE OF A CULT read from the perspective of someone who had no idea what a cult was, BARN. I repeat, BARN.

episodes.title: Ep 3: Resting Bewildered Face with Mike White
episodes.description:
This week we have a particularly long episode for you, because we couldn’t part with any of the content we loved it so much. Listen at 1.5 speed if you must, but it is a great time the whole way through because this week our guest is Mike White! Former TLW member and “blow out,” he is also the guest of our sisterbrothermother podcast, Snapping Out Of It! Enjoy the madness as we get into topics like:

• The true meaning of RBF 
• Reclaiming your creativity after musical trauma 
• Recognizing red flags in relationships 
• The moment you realize pastors can’t read minds 


CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Religious and Spiritual Ab*se, Physical and Emotional Ab*se, High Control Environments/Relationships, Narcissistic Abuse and Manipulation, $*xually Inappropriate Behavior and Grooming by Authority Figures, Childhood $*xual Ab*se, The Ever-Present Danger of Diddlers, Word For The World, Big Boney Energy, Mommy and Daddy Issues.

episodes.title: Ep 2: Heavy Meddling With Charity Navalesi
episodes.description:
Ladies, Theydies, and Gentlefriends, we present: OUR FIRST GUEST! She is an incomparable multidisciplinary artist, she is the WICKedly talented host of the podcast “Oops I’m In A Cult!” She is the one and only: Charity Navalesi.  Join us as we cackle, weep, hyperventilate, and emotionally regulate our way through topics like: 

* The search for healthy healing tools 
* Navigating pesky attachment patterns
* Rock bottom’s bottom 
* Sweatin’ it out for Jesus 
* Where not to put garlic 

CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Religious and Spiritual Abuse, High Control Environments/Relationships, Narcissistic Abuse and Manipulation, Inscrutable Sexual Analogies, Heavy Meddling, Garlic Snatch

episodes.title: Ep 1: The Disappointment Begins
episodes.description:
In our very exciting first episode, we'll be giving you, dear listener, some context on who we are, what the heck this show is, and why we can't stop crying at the grocery store! (It’s the trauma.) Tune in to hear us ramble on about all of this and more as we discuss:
The cult from whence we cameLeaving a harmful environment and the messy feelings that followThe power of sharing stories, even the painful onesThe all-too-relatable story of getting groped in the Pope Room at Bucca Di Beppo   (You know the one)
CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Sexual and Physical Abuse, Childhood Sexual Abuse, Religious and Spiritual Abuse, Bucca Di Beppo
